name: Alyssa Garguilo
bio:
Alyssa is a sophomore majoring in Computer Science. She is a graduate of the Texas Academy of 
	          Mathematics and Science, a member of both Collegium V and the Computer Science Computing Scholars program, 
	          and an all-around nerd. In her spare time, Alyssa enjoys playing tabletop role playing games, cooking, and 
	          petting dogs.
